description: The sleeping quarters for miners are infested with fatigue-inducing fumes from poor ventilation. Resting here restores energy but requires fixing the issue. A foreman could organize repairs, or trading rocks might buy better air filters.

description: Chacao ex-subway tunnels, 2099. Cyber hunger is killing you. The black market sells synthetic arepas made with hacked flour from Colombia and mutant soy from Guri. without a cybernetic stomach.
name: synthetic_arepa_black_market

description: In the shadows of Caracas 2099, your forged ID flickers under corporate scanners. Fix it fast or face the black market thugs. Use bribes, hacks, or contacts to legitimize your alias and continue on your 'criolla' odyssey.
name: without_papers
